text: @EzekielElliott From a @Giants fan, I hope that you recover quickly!  Follow the advice offered by your doctors and trainers.  Interesting that the current players at @OhioStAthletics signed a coronavirus pledge recently.  While I hope that there will be an NFL season, I’m not optimistic.
